## 🤔

**Network centrality concept**

Chapter 26 ("Centrality") from McLevey, J., Carrington, P. J., & Scott, J.
(2023). [*The Sage handbook of social network analysis*](https://go.exlibris.link/rW0j0hZX). Sage.

**Practical importance of intra-organizational networks**

Cross, R., Liedtka, J., & Weiss, L. (2005). *[A practical guide to social
networks*](https://go.exlibris.link/9lZS2t2V). Harvard Business Review, 83(3), 124-132.

**Centrality and social influence in networks**

Griskevicius, V., Cialdini, R. B., & Goldstein, N. J. (2008). [*Applying (and
resisting) peer influence*](https://go.exlibris.link/FnvYsnT0). MIT Sloan Management Review, 49(2), 84.
:::
